00032 #ifndef RENDERTHREAD_HPP_
00033 #define RENDERTHREAD_HPP_
00034 
00035 using namespace std;
00036 
00037 namespace ebl {
00038   
00039   template<class T>
00040   void RenderThread::grey_draw_matrix(Idx<T> &im, int x, int y, T minv, T maxv, 
00041                                       double zoomw, double zoomh) {
00042     if (mutex->tryLock(MUTEX_WAIT_MSEC)) {
00043       Idx<ubyte> uim = grey_image_to_ubyte<T>(im, minv, maxv, zoomw, zoomh);
00044       copy(uim, x, y);
00045       // send image to main gui thread
00046       emit renderedImage();
00047       mutex->unlock();
00048     } else lock_failed_warning();
00049   }
00050   
00051   void grey_draw_matrix(Idx<double> &im, int x, int y, double minv, double maxv,
00052                         double zoomw, double zoomh);
00053   void grey_draw_matrix(Idx<int> &im, int x, int y, int minv, int maxv,
00054                         double zoomw, double zoomh);
00055   void grey_draw_matrix(Idx<ubyte> &im, int x, int y, ubyte minv, ubyte maxv,
00056                         double zoomw, double zoomh);
00057 
00058 } // end namespace ebl
00059 
00060 #endif /* RENDERTHREAD_HPP_ */
